Summary: hovered over local dump bright light's
divs: Sighting DetailsOn 1-15-2013. I was getting myself a drink for the night. When our neighbors kid came in the house talking about seeing strange lights across the field near our local dump. He described them like flares. I even said you're seeing flares. But he described the lights to be yellow and orange. We then proceeded outside to observe the lights he was seeing. To my astonishment. I see these lights hovering in the area just across the street. The mother than reported the object to have lifted a vehicle and disappear. According the neighbors there were 3 objects in the beginning and what was still being seen was one object almost close to the ground before completely disappearing. Before the object disappeared myself & the neighbors kid went as close as we could by the dump to get a Better look but was unsuccessful. I then reported this sighting to local police but was redirected to MUFON.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Casa Grande
There were 4 other sightings in Casa Grande on or around January 15th 2013
